title: Martindale The Complete Drug Reference, 36th Edition

<a href="http://i.imgur.com/Q5UIgTZ.jpg" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://i.imgur.com/Q5UIgTZ.jpg</a>

This book provides reliable, unbiased and evaluated information on drugs and medicines used throughout the world. Each new drug licensed for use has its own potential benefits and adverse effects, and its own profile for dosage, administration and indications. Furthermore, manufacturers make regular changes to existing drug names and formulations, which can affect their interactions and safe usage.
